title: Thanksgiving Turkey Dressing
ingredients: 6 slices white or whole wheat bread or biscuits
1 med sized apple, shredded or chopped fine
instructions: Add liquid from chicken (3 qts water with 2 tsp salt, 1 hen boiled 3-4 hrs until tender) to make it consistency of unbaked corn bread, don't get it too dry, add water if needed. Beat 4 eggs and add. Pour into large baking pan. Bake at 450Â° for 1 hour.
